file_content.text: You talk about Big Jan, doctor make sure you no talk again.
You bring goods?
Doctor say, two people, look out.
Now time, cut out spice....
Did she say... "spice"?
You thought we were smuggling cough syrup?
What did you expect?
I just hoped there was a little truth to his story. That he really was helping the people here.
What happened to "Oh, I'll do anything for Rona. She couldn't possibly be involved in anything bad..."?
Told you so.
This has nothing to do with Rona. They lied!
This slime is going down!
I'm going to kill her.
You used us. If you weren't a lady, you'd--I gotta go have a word with your boss.
I not speak Basic. You say... take spice away?
Good spice. I give good money. Big... how you say, "cut."
We're not asking for a bigger cut, you idiot!
How big a cut are we talking?
Speak for yourself.
Here. I give good share.
I don't believe you!
You know what? Nevermind. Let's just see if that blasted Devaronian knows anything about Rona.
Let's deal with our "messenger of mercy."
Forget her, Corso.
Definitely.
This is going to be your last shipment, lady. Get a job.
No one's going to profit off this.
He's right. [Destroy spice]
No! Is good money! Good good money!
Doctor no be happy with this!
Good. We're not too happy with him. C'mon, Captain.
No speak Basic.
